comment.author: 39839593@N00
comment._content:
General von Hindenburg.

Möge uns der Geist von 1914/15
erhalten bleiben!

May the spirit of 1914/15 
be kept!

edit: corrected thanks to B-59 (below).

comment.author: 36645048@N00
comment._content: Generalfeldmarschall Paul von Hindenburg was colonel a la suite of 3 Garde Regiment zu Fuss. A rare distinction so he wears the collar and cuff tabs of this regiment instead of the red and gold of a general. Only the crossed batons on the shoulders boards show his true rank. He wears the Pour le Merite with oakleaves at his throat and the Iron Cross 1st and 2nd Class.
